roleset.name: say without proof
roleset.note: ALLEGE-V NOTES: Verbnet entry say-37.7. Framenet entry Statement. Comparison with verbs of saying. (from allege.01-v)
ALLEGATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry allege.01, OntoNotes grouping allegation-n senses 1& 2; maps to VN class say-37.7. Framed by Claire. (from allegation.01-n)

roles.note: Verb entry lacks arg3 "against" argument, but it seems useful in disambiguating from hearer, which is also potentially equivalent to an argm-GOL argument. (from allegation.01-n)

role.descr: person against whom something is alleged

example.text: The complaint alleges that the price is ``unfair and grossly inadequate''

example.text: John alleged to Mary that he was wearing no underwear.
example.arg: that he was wearing no underwear
